member.name: T:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonTrackVector4
member.summary: A track that will animate properties with a Vector4 data type.

member.name: T:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack
member.summary: A track for an animated property on an animated object.
member.remarks: Custom tracks may be built by the user by inheriting from this object. When a custom track is built, the user will need to add that track to the GorgonAnimation.Tracks collection. Please note that when a custom track is built a custom key frame type must be built to accompany the track.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.BuildGetAccessor``1
member.summary: Function to build a get accessor for the property that will be manipulated by the track.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.BuildSetAccessor``1
member.summary: Function to build a set accessor for the property that will be manipulated by the track.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.SetupSpline
member.summary: Function to set up the spline for the animation.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.GetTweenKey(GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys@,GorgonLibrary.Animation.IKeyFrame@,System.Single)
member.summary: Function to interpolate a new key frame from the nearest previous and next key frames.
member.param: Nearest previous and next key frames.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.ApplyKey(GorgonLibrary.Animation.IKeyFrame@)
member.summary: Function to apply the key value to the object properties.
member.param: Key to apply to the properties.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.GetKeyAtTime(System.Single)
member.summary: Function to retrieve a key frame for a given time.
member.returns: A keyframe at that time. Note that this can be a key frame that was interpolated because it doesn't actually exist in the collection.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.GetNearestKeys(System.Single)
member.summary: Function to retrieve the nearest keys to the specified time interval.
member.returns: The nearest keys to the interval.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.#ctor(GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationCollection.AnimatedProperty)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.Spline
member.summary: Property to return the spline control interface.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.SupportedInterpolation
member.summary: Property to return the supported interpolation modes for this track.
member.remarks: This will return one or more of the interpolation modes supported. The interpolation mode "None" is always supported.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.InterpolationMode
member.summary: Property to set or return the interpolation mode for the track.
member.remarks: This value depends on which interpolation modes are supported for tweening. If the track does not support interpolation, this value will have no effect.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.KeyFrames
member.summary: Property to return the list of key frames for this animation.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.Animation
member.summary: Property to return the animation that this track belongs to.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.DataType
member.summary: Property to return the type of data that is represented by the key frames in the track.

member.name: T:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys
member.summary: Value type containing information about the nearest keys for a time position.

member.name: M:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.#ctor(GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack,System.Single)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.TrackTimePosition
member.summary: Property to return the track time position requested.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.PreviousKey
member.summary: Property to return the previous key to the time position.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.NextKey
member.summary: Property to return the next key from the time position.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.PreviousKeyIndex
member.summary: Property to return the previous key index.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.NextKeyIndex
member.summary: Property to return the next key index.

member.name: P:GorgonLibrary.Animation.GorgonAnimationTrack.NearestKeys.KeyTimeDelta
member.summary: Property to return the delta between the previous and next frames. 0 if equal to the previous keyframe, 1.0 if equal to the next keyframe.
